trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_SEQ_00<tab>Laxio the sylph needs help to put down djiggas.

TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_SEQ_01<tab>Laxio explains that his people are being preyed upon by buzzing djiggas whenever they venture outside Little Solace to bathe in sunlight. He has instructed a pair of sylphs to act as bait to lure the ravenous parasites into the open, and asks that you put the vilekin down.
TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_SEQ_02<tab>You have exterminated the djiggas. Report back to Laxio at Little Solace.

TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_SEQ_03<tab>Back at Little Solace, you learn that sylphs need sunlight in order to survive. Thanks to your help, they can now get their required dose without becoming djigga fodder.
TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_TODO_00<tab>Defeat buzzing djiggas at the specified location.
TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_TODO_01<tab>Report to Laxio at Little Solace.
TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_LAXIO_000_000<tab>These ones need help! Please help these ones!
TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_LAXIO_000_001<tab>Vile ones called buzzing djiggas think these ones are food. Attack these ones! Attack whenever these ones go into the forest to bathe in sunlight!

TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_LAXIO_000_002<tab>Some of these ones have gone into the forest─into the forest to lure out vile ones. This one wants walking one to wait for vile ones─wait nearby and slay vile ones that come.
TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_LAXIO_000_010<tab>These ones must bathe in sunlight to survive. Without sunlight, these ones will fall ill─fall ill and shrivel away to no ones!
TEXT_GAIUSA107_00721_LAXIO_000_011<tab>Thanks to walking one, these ones can safely bathe in sunlight again! Praise be to walking one!
